message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Thanks for your offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still a bit above my budget, how about we try $92?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, $100 is the absolute lowest I can go.
